profile:
Welcome to SAMS Electrical Services Ltd.
In economics, business is the social science of managing people to organize and maintain collective productivity toward accomplishing particular creative and productive goals, usually to generate revenue. The etymology of "business" refers to the state of being busy, in the context of the individual as well as the community or society.

In other words, to be busy is to be doing commercially viable and profitable work.

The term "business" has at least three usages, depending on the scope — the general usage (above), the singular usage to refer to a particular company or corporation, and the generalized usage to refer to a particular market sector, such as "the record business," "the computer business," or "the business community" -- the community of suppliers of goods and services.

The singular "business" can be a legally-recognized entity within an economically free society, wherein individuals organize based on expertise and skills to bring about social and technological advancement.

profile:
Toronto Generators (formerly Paga Technologies) has been installing and servicing standby generators since 2002. When the power goes out, a standby generator comes on automatically, restoring power to your home, business or cottage. We proudly supported our many clients through the December 2013 ice storm, and have expanded in order to continue providing exceptional service to our growing customer base.

We pride ourselves on our exceptional customer service, and our staff have the knowledge, experience and training to answer all of your questions. We would be happy to provide you with a site visit and written quote free of charge, so please call us today! Our specialty is Generator Installation and Service!

https://homestars.com/companies/2887141-toronto-generators

services: Toronto Generators is your authorized Generac installer in the Toronto area. We also service Parry Sound, Muskoka, Barrie, Newmarket, Collingwood, Caledon, Brampton, Mississauga, and Oakville. When you work with Toronto Generators, you can rest assured that all electrical codes will be followed, as will TSSA regulations in making all fuel connections. The result will be a safe, reliable installation you can count on when the power goes out. Toronto Generators is also committed to supporting our customers through maintenance, repair, and warranty work.

profile:
About Us
Since 1996, we’ve proudly served residential and commercial customers in the GTA area. Our goal is to bring excellence in all aspects of electrical services from small renovations to large scale outdoor work, by providing prompt, high quality workmanship - at competitive rates. Our approach is simple: We take the time to understand what our customers’ needs are and develop the right plan, at the right price. We pride ourselves on our professionalism - friendly, skilled and insured for your protection. We stand behind everything we do with our satisfaction guaranteed policy. Visit our services page to see what we can do for you today!

profile:
Bram Town Electric has been providing the services of electrical contractors in Brampton and area, for both residential and commercial clients. Whether you need an electrician for a minor repair or a major electrical overhaul, we can do both. Some of our electricians have more than 20 years of experience in electrical contracting, and have the dexterity and knowledge to figure out even the toughest problems. We handle the electric setup, repair and wiring for lighting, AC/DC motors, control panels, fire alarm systems, and many more.

We are also licensed and insured with WSIB, and all of our master electricians are certified by the Electrical Safety Authority (ESA) to inspect work performed to prevent electrical malfunctions. Any work done by our electrical contractors in Brampton or elsewhere in the GTA will be safe and complete according to local safety standards. We are also listed with the Better Business Bureau.

If you’re not happy with the work performed, let us know, and we will work to resolve the issue. That’s the kind of commitment we provide to our customers. To schedule an appointment with us today, call 647-678-2413 , and we will be at your home or business in no time!
